metadata.name: Alexander's mirror
metadata.description:
The Peacock Angel is getting ready for her wedding celebration on the eleventh day of the month in the Mishan Plain.
Love is like a mirror, and the lover is the reflection of the power and manifestation of the beauty of the beloved. She looks in a mirror called the mirror of Alexander. This mirror that casts out evil spirits is the mirror of her fortune.


This artwork is based on a combination of photography and painting, using the photomontage technique in Adobe Photoshop. 

Actual size: 5196* 5906 pixels
